snippet.title: Ale Hop! MSX1 (Topo Soft 1988)
snippet.description: Good game made in Spain, graphics are well done, specially as it's a MSX 1 game, and it's innovative and cute. I'm a really bad Ale Hop player but this is enough to give an idea of how the game looks and plays.
